title: Cu-Mediated Broadening of the Absorption Band of Quaternary Cu-Ag-In-S/CdSe Type-II Core/Shell Quantum Dot-Sensitized Solar Cells with an Efficiency of 12.51% Under 0.25 Sun
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00252K, Paper
Siti Utari Rahayu, Andy Candra, Jen-Bin Shi, Ming-Way Lee
We report the effects of Cu substitution on the photovoltaic performance of (a) single-layered Cu-Ag-In-S and (b) core/shell Cu-Ag-In-S/CdSe quantum-dot sensitized solar cells (QDSSCs). Recently, ternary Ag-In-S/CdSe core/shell QDSSCs have...
